ing: 1 red apple - peeled, cored, and diced
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "A crunchy salsa comes together with diced mango, apple, cucumber, and yellow bell pepper. Toss with lime and orange juice, cilantro, and jalapeno for a tangy side dish."
ins: Toss mango, apple, cucumber, yellow bell pepper, onion, cilantro, jalapeno pepper, lime juice, orange juice, salt, and black pepper together in a bowl.
